executionStatus.name: executionStatus
executionStatus.description:
Retrieve pending transactions.
Accepted values: pending, success, fail.

transaction.name: body
transaction.description:
The request body can contain only one property:
- transaction (required): Binary payload

dryrunTransaction.name: dryrunTransaction
dryrunTransaction.description:
The request body can contain three properties:
- transaction (required): Binary payload or a transaction object
- skipVerify (optional, default: false): A boolean indicator to skip the transaction verification
- skipDecode (optional, default: false): A boolean indicator to skip the auto-decoding of the event data

transactionEstimateFees.name: transaction
transactionEstimateFees.description:
The request body can only contain one property:
- transaction (required): Transaction object

 Note: The transaction object must contain these following properties: module, command, nonce, senderPublicKey and params
